# DNS records for feedsubscription.com
# Edit this file and run `make dns-update` to apply changes.
#
# Format: TYPE NAME TTL PRIORITY DATA
# - PRIORITY is 0 for non-MX records
# - DATA is everything after the 4th field (may contain spaces)
# - Lines starting with # and blank lines are ignored

# --- Hosting ---
A       @                3600   0   207.154.253.211
A       localhost        3600   0   207.154.253.211
CNAME   www              43200  0   @

# --- Mail ---
MX      @                3600   10  @

# --- Email authentication ---
TXT     @                3600   0   v=spf1 mx include:spf.protection.outlook.com include:ppe-hosted.com -all
TXT     mail._domainkey  3600   0   v=DKIM1; h=sha256; k=rsa; s=email; 
TXT     _dmarc           3600   0   v=DMARC1; p=reject; adkim=s; aspf=s; rua=mailto:dmarc-reports@feedsubscription.com; ri=604800

# --- Google Search Console verification ---
TXT     @                3600   0   google-site-verification=cSSQYxQXkz37jcRrQtn044JPmFUsxC9D8oXyhyuVCuY
